Everyone can say "I love you" but not everyone really means it. So believe it when you feel it, not when you hear it.
Spend time knowing the person more because a person's past will definitely play a role for who is he now :)
Always look for true love than mere romance, for Romance fades overtime but true love is forever. Have a nice Monday :)
Being hurt is part of break ups but being stupid is not. :)
We're not broken just bent, we can learn to love again.
I fall, I rise, I make mistakes, I live, I learn, I've been hurt but I'm alive. I'm human, I'm not perfect but I'm thankful.
Sometimes we need pain to finally realize the truth in our lives.
Love is not about how much love you have in the beginning but how much love you build till the end.
There is no permanent without commitment and there is no lasting love without constant sacrifice.
We just need to teach ourselves to moved on & think that someday you will find the person who will sit beside you.
On a silent night when friends are few , I close my eyes and think of you, A silent night, A silent tear, A silent wish that you were here.
Love can leave a memory that no one can steal,but...love can also leave a pain that no one can heal...
Sometimes,LIFE can be TOUGH but always remember so are YOU.

The most painful thing in life is not losing the one you love but losing yourself in the process of loving someone so much.
I was mistaken, you're not right for me, but I can't seem to get enough of you.
Once you think you trust someone and pour your heart and soul into it, you get hurt. Stuck between leaving or staying...
Just because you were not right for someone doesn't mean you will never be right for anyone.
There is no permanent without commitment and there is no lasting love without constant sacrifice. ♥
An EX should stay an EX.They're the EXample of false love and EXplanation for why you deserve better.

#IDontHaveTimeFor thinking that I'll never find someone like him again.I should think that he'll never find someone as amazing as ME again..
#ThingsThatILove Kiss on a forehead ... so sweet ♥
Its not loving others that bring you pain,its expecting that others will love you back because sometimes they don't & sometimes they can't.
The best revenge is just moving on and getting over it.Don't give someone the satisfaction of watching you suffer.
Sucessful relationships are not mere coincidence they are combination of love, respect, and hardwork.
Love is like a traffic light. there are three colors which become a guide for us when to stop, to let go and to take action
I still love you, that's a fact. But a million apologies can't bring me back...
Truth is, everybody is going to hurt you.You just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.
Sometimes we want to go back. However the hurt sometimes is greater than love. Take time to heal.
Sometimes the truth hurts but is better to know it than live a life of lie.
Familiarity kills a relationship.
Sometimes an apology is the only answer to a complicated problem.
Always choose reason over carnal thoughts, just like choosing love over pure sex.
Those who never experienced pain will never expeience happiness.
What would you do for love?
Sometimes the best decisions are the most hurtful and painful.
Relationships are work in progress by a team.  The operative words are "work" "progress" and " team".
Sometimes we need to sacrifice in order to succeed. But too much sacrifice is foolishness. Love yourself so that someone will love you back.
It is the woman who chooses the man who will choose her
Tomorrow will be another day. If there are disagreements today, don't worry it will be settled tomorrow. Just put that pride down. :)

If you feel the space between you and your partner, reconnect by looking at ur old pictures & remind yourselves on how u guys used to be. :)

If you want to be loved, be lovable.
